The '''[[Barclays Center]]''' is an [[arena|indoor arena]] in [[Brooklyn]], [[New York City]] opened in September 2012. With a maximum capacity of 15,813 to 19,000 depending on the event, the arena is used for sporting events such as basketball and is the host of the [[NBA|NBA's]] [[Brooklyn Nets]], as well as ice hockey. The Barclays Center is also more predominantly used as a music venue, hosting multiple concerts, festivals and award ceremonies since its opening. The following is a complete list of all concerts and music events that have been or will be held at the arena.
